p: The eight fractions generated by hexane ( Table 1) show varying yields with the highest being SH1 with 72.35% followed by SH7 (9.11%). The others give yields less than 5.12%. The yields of fractions generated by acetone extract were calculated relative to the mass of the mother extract of acetone ( FA) introduced at the beginning. SA1 represents the highest yield at 62.88% followed by SA11 at 15.82%. The other fractions were all less than 10%.
